about_the_game:
Hide, Seek, Survive.

Voodoom is a casual asymmetric horror game set in a sprawling, eerie mansion. Team up as voodoo dolls to explore, collect powerups, and seek revenge on the monster that cursed you. Or, lurk in the darkness as the giant monster, ready to strike and eliminate the dolls before they grow too powerful.

Key Features

  • Bound To Burlap - Team up with up to four players, each controlling a voodoo doll. Use teamwork and strategy to collect powerups and take down the monster.

  • It's Too Dark... - Every game is a new adventure with a vast, procedurally generated mansion to explore, filled with hidden secrets and eerie surprises, all shrouded in darkness.

  • It Grows Impatient - Take on the role of the monster, designed to hunt and eliminate the dolls. With the ability to see in the dark, use your powers to create jump scares and pick off the dolls before they become too powerful.

  • It Can Hear Us... - Experience hilarious and heart-pounding moments with proximity-based voice chat. Communicate with your team and strategize in real-time, but don't let the monster hear you...

  • Progression System - Unlock new abilities and perks for both dolls and the monster. Customize your playstyle and grow stronger with each match.

  • Character Customization - Personalize the look of your voodoo dolls with a variety of cosmetic options. Stand out in the darkness with unique appearances and outfits.

  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
